channel.title: Stocks And Jocks
channel.description: Stocks And Jocks is an entertaining and informative financial show hosted by investment industry experts by Tom Haugh and Jon Najarian.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Stocks And Jocks is an entertaining and informative financial show hosted by investment industry experts by Tom Haugh and Jon Najarian.
channel.itunes:summary: This is NOT typical business news - this is a GREAT TALK SHOW that focuses on business, providing real financial information, market analysis, and breaking news right from the trenches of the trading day. This fun, information packed and sometimes-irreverent program is just the thing for active investors who need to get information about what to expect from Wall Street.
channel.itunes:keywords: Tom Haugh, Jon Najarian, Stocks, Jocks, finance, investing, markets, stocks, options, futures, analysis, bonds, economy, sports
